abstract: Robert Dudley’s comments contrasted with those of other oil executives who laid the blame for a Gulf of Mexico blowout and oil spill on the design of BP’s well.
snippet: Robert Dudley’s comments contrasted with those of other oil executives who laid the blame for a Gulf of Mexico blowout and oil spill on the design of BP’s well.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON  In his first public address to oil industry executives since becoming chief of BP, Robert Dudley said the entire industry needed to change to prevent another devastating deepwater oil spill like the one BP suffered last year.

headline.main: BP Chief Says Industry Must Change to Guard Against Spills
headline.print_headline: BP Chief Says Industry Must Change to Guard Against Spills
